events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me at all. I'd like to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request was identified as a refund due to return of product because of size issues.
The case was assigned to customer service agent Sarah M. to handle the refund request.
Hello! I'm Sarah, and I'll be assisting you with your return and refund. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, please confirm if the jacket has been worn or if the tags are still attached.
The jacket is completely unworn and the tags are still on. My order number is ORD123456789.
Thank you for the information. You can return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label I'll send shortly. Once received, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! That sounds perfect. I appreciate your help.
I have emailed the prepaid shipping label to you. Please use it to send back the jacket at your earliest convenience.
We wanted to check if you were able to send the jacket back and if you have any questions about the refund process.
Yes, I sent the jacket back last week using the prepaid label. No issues so far, thanks for following up.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund to your original payment method. Thank you for your patience.
Your refund case is now closed. Please let us know if you need further assistance in the future.
We sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our refund process. We appreciate your feedback.
